fieldsOfStudy: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

defaultPosition.description: Support the specialized investigative mission of agency and participate as part of a team in the investigative mission of national/international investigative programs and liaison activities. May advise on, and/or perform work consisting of a systematic examination and interpretation of legal and financial records/documents and employment documents relative to the investigative mission.
defaultPosition.title: Auditor

positions.description: Support the specialized investigative mission of agency and participate as part of a team in the investigative mission of national/international investigative programs and liaison activities. May advise on, and/or perform work consisting of a systematic examination and interpretation of legal and financial records/documents and employment documents relative to the investigative mission.
positions.title: Auditor

positions.description: Performs audits of large multi-state and multinational corporations for compliance with sales tax and telecommunications service tax laws. Consults with or assists clients in the proper means of determining tax liability. Audits all books of original and closing entry for corporations and other business entities that may lead to an indication of error in interpretation or application of the law. Reviews federal income tax returns to detect unreported income, false allocation of receipts and expenses, fictitious or improper deductions, fraudulent claims, and other reporting discrepancies.
positions.title: Tax Auditor

positions.description: Developed and maintained Visual Basic programming used to produce flat file invoicing for, and receive flat file invoicing from worker's compensation insurance companies.
positions.title: Contract Programmer

positions.description: Assists in the development of computer programs , systems and related procedures to process data. Provides efficient system designs and technical specifications. Codes, tests, debuts and implements computer solutions and procedures in coordination with the computer operations and user departments. Within the scope of responsibilities, continually focuses on process improvement to ensure the customer's needs are met for high quality, cost-effective logistics services while meeting corporate values and objectives.
positions.title: Programmer

positions.description: Provides full accounting services for eleven corporations, including general ledger, accounts receivable, accounts payable, fixed asset management, payroll, sales tax computation and preparation.
positions.title: Accountant

positions.description: Directs Supply Department activities and priorities. Approves requisitions, balance sheets and summaries. Directs receiving, storage, issue and salvage of material. Oversees procurement and sale of goods and services. Conducts disbursing activities in connection with property accountability and transfer, payroll and personal accounts. Plans and administers budget of naval activity. Administers operation of officer's mess and recreational facilities and enlisted food service facilities. Administers retail sales operations, ship's services and postal operations.
positions.title: Supply Officer

positions.description: Install, remove, inspect, test maintain and repair all communication and navigation systems on VH-3, VH-1, CH-53, and CH-46 aircraft in Presidential support mission. Scheduled and facilitated preventive maintenance for aircraft support equipment.
positions.title: Communication and Navigation Systems Technician
